Author: red_ossifrage
Text: I find those articles so surreal in their descriptions of ED sufferers, which are always juuust off enough to make it feel like they're not quite...describing humans. Like we're not people, but humanoid cryptids that *probably* exist.   This isn't helped by the weird accompanying photos that you've pointed out. Instead of showing humans, those pages show pictures of objects like measuring tapes, scales, and ~symbolic~ apple cores. (Okay, sometimes they do show a thin white girl staring into a mirror. But that is an even worse image choice, for so many reasons.)

Author: Dalos_
Text: Theyâ€™re for people without EDs and they have to be shocking- which I think is unrealistic, especially since so many people struggling have different issues than that.
